name: Star Atlas
description: A grand strategy game of space exploration, territorial conquest, political domination, and more.

name: The Heist
description: A high-stakes, risk-based game of crime, corruption... and bananas.

name: Rude Golems
description: War is upon us, lets battle!

name: Pixel Guild
description: Heroes, Spells and Monsters accompanied by fantastic gameplay and a mystical soundtrack.

name: AGE of SAM
description: Play as Hero or Villain in a Galactic Battle on the Dark Side of the Moon.

name: The Sol Den
description: Three rival gyms competing for fame and glory.

name: The Remnants
description: Spend your time exploring Longwood Valley, gathering loot, crafting items and obtaining land.

name: Reavers
description: Plunder bustling cities, raid lucrative docks, and steer clear of prison or the perils of mutiny.

name: DeFi Land
description: DeFi Land is a multi-chain agriculture-simulation game created to gamify Decentralized Finance.
